context: Alternative Slowbar:Roaster aims to strengthen identity and revenue in 90 days without playing external specialty authority games.
objective: Increase repeat customers and stabilize cashflow by building a place-based identity narrative while keeping backend quality consistent.
constraints: Must maintain service quality and speed
Must show measurable progress in 90 days
strategy_thesis: In an AI-commoditized era, technical competence becomes common. Identity, meaning, and trust artifacts become the differentiator. Use AI only for backend consistency; invest human energy in narrative and community.

actions.name: Define the 'Signature Narrative Format' (Place + Season + Intention)
actions.success_criteria: Template is used consistently for 4 weeks without increasing workload stress.

actions.name: Launch 1 signature menu item tied to story (seasonal limited run)
actions.expected_output: One high-margin signature drink or brew offering.
actions.success_criteria: Signature item reaches 15-25% of weekly orders by week 6.

actions.name: Instrument minimal measurement (repeat rate proxy + weekly log)
actions.expected_output: Weekly dashboard: repeat rate proxy, revenue, complaints, service time.
actions.success_criteria: Metrics recorded weekly for 8+ consecutive weeks.

actions.name: Backend QC evidence-lite (taste note consistency log / batch notes)
actions.success_criteria: QC rejects decrease or remain stable while output volume stays stable.

actions.name: Community loop: 1 micro-event or tasting circle per month
actions.expected_output: Monthly community gathering anchored to story and season.
actions.success_criteria: At least 15 attendees or equivalent engagement, and a measurable lift in repeat visits afterward.

metrics.name: Repeat Customer Rate (proxy)
metrics.definition: Percent of weekly customers who return within 14 days (use POS identifier or simple stamp card proxy).
metrics.measurement_method: Weekly log from POS or proxy method

metrics.name: Signature Item Mix
metrics.definition: Share of total orders represented by the signature menu item.

metrics.name: Complaint / QC Issue Rate
metrics.definition: Number of service or taste complaints per week normalized by total orders.

risk_bounds.max_loss: Do not spend beyond 1 month of net cash runway on validation/branding expenses.
risk_bounds.max_time_loss: If no metric lift by week 8, pivot strategy within 7 days.
risk_bounds.reversibility: Reduce cadence, simplify menu, and reallocate effort to strongest-performing action path (content or offer) based on metrics.

stop_triggers: Complaint rate > 2x baseline for 2 consecutive weeks
Operational overload (service time increases > 30% for 3 weeks)

review_questions: Which assumption is most at risk this week?
Did any falsifier approach fail condition?
What must we stop doing to preserve quality and energy?
update_actions: Trigger pivot if week-8 gate fails

notes: This playbook is designed to be reversible and evidence-driven.
